attributes.action: Make billeting all backbench MPs with randomly selected UK families, mandatory.
attributes.background: Placing such an obligation upon ALL backbench MPs would go some way towards ensuring that Parliament has a broad and informed perspective upon the UK's social, economic and geographic divides. Each MP should be required to spend two weeks each year with a randomly selected family.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for individual MPs not the UK Parliament and Government.
